item.title: Shrimp Allergy Affects Quality of Life in Adults
item.description: Adults with shrimp allergy report reduced quality of life and a desire for therapies that would allow them to safely eat a full serving of shrimp. Med...

item.title: AC in Nursing Homes Tied to Fewer Deaths From Extreme Heat
item.description: The likelihood of death on days of extreme heat is lower among residents of nursing homes with air conditioning than those without, a study finds. Med...

item.title: Andexxa Withdrawn From US Market
